i1.name: Harrier
i1.cooldown: {{tt|{{pp|type=critical strike chance|color=critical chance|11|8*(0.99^((x-1)*10))|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=8*(0.99 ^ critical strike chance %)}}|Unaffected by cooldown reduction}}
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''{{ci|Valor}}''' periodically marks a nearby [[sight|visible]] [[unit]] as '''Vulnerable''', {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds. Units hit by {{ai|Blinding Assault|Quinn}}, {{ai|Vault|Quinn}} and {{ai|Skystrike|Quinn}} will also be marked as '''Vulnerable'''.

'''Quinn's''' next [[basic attack]] against a '''Vulnerable''' target deals {{pp|10 to 95|color=physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|16 to 50}} AD)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.

''Harrier'' is disabled while {{ai|Behind Enemy Lines|Quinn}} is active and for a few seconds after a target's mark ends. The {{sti|cooldown}} of ''Harrier'' is reduced by by 1% for every {{sti|critical strike chance|{{as|1% critical strike chance}}}}, but with {{tt|diminishing returns|stacks multiplicatively rather than additively}}.
i1.notes:
* ''Harrier's'' targeting priority:
*# Last unit hit (if it was a small minion it appears to select a different target).
*# Lowest-health enemy champion.
*# Lowest-health enemy minion.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Harrier's'' bonus damage.
* As with most on-hit physical damage ''Harrier's'' bonus damage will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* ''Harrier'' is consumed but does no damage if the enhanced attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if '''Quinn''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Harrier's'' bonus damage will not affect structures even if '''Quinn''' is seen using its attack animation against them if the ensuing basic attack was the last one prior.
* Basic attacks that are already in-flight will trigger and consume ''Harrier'' mark.
* If a mark was originally applied by {{ai|Blinding Assault|Quinn}} or {{ai|Vault|Quinn}}, attacking that ''Vulnerable'' target will place ''Harrier's'' passive application on a 1 second cooldown instead of its full duration.

q1.name: Blinding Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' signals '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to fly forward in a line, stopping when he collides with a unit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and applying {{tip|nearsight}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Non-[[champion]] targets are {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} instead for the same duration.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 50% AP)

w1.name: Heightened Senses
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Attacking a {{ai|Harrier|Quinn|Vulnerable}} target grants '''Quinn''' {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' orders '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to {{tip|sight|reveal}} the area around her for 2 seconds.

effects.levelingtext:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 80}}%}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20 to 40}}%}}
effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %

  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Vault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target unit, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}}, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% which decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, before {{tip|dash|leaping back}} and landing 525 units away from them.
e1.notes:
* ''Quinn'' will automatically attempt to attack the target once she completes ''Vault''.
* Unlike its constant cast range ''Vault's'' bounce's can vary to allow ''Quinn'' to close or to make a gap between herself and an enemy unit (depending on casting position) or even to jump through a wall (if there is enough landing room on the other side).
* ''Quinn'' will track and follow the target if they move, {{tip|dash}}, or {{tip|blink}}.

r2.name: Skystrike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' detaches from '''{{ci|Valor}}''', ending {{ais|Behind Enemy Lines|Quinn}} effects, and deals {{as|40% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to all units around her.
Launching a basic attack, {{ai|Blinding Assault|Quinn}}, or {{ai|Vault|Quinn}} during {{ai|Behind Enemy Lines|Quinn}} automatically activates ''Skystrike''.
r2.notes: * If ''Quinn'' uses {{ai|Vault|Quinn}} while {{ai|Behind Enemy Lines}} is active then ''Skystrike'' will activate at her target's location after she bounces.
